title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin compares the Boston Celtics window for championship success to a hugely popular sitcom that almost didn't see a second season. Also, Colin has a perfect new home for quarterback Baker Mayfield. Plus, there is a great basketball culture in San Francisco due, in part, to Golden State coach Steve Kerr's background as an assistant on some very successful teams, but Warrior guard Steph Curry also came into the league as a more mature player and person.  Later, NBA veteran Ryan Hollins joins The Herd to tell Colin what the Los Angeles Lakers should do with guard Russell Westbrook, how the Warriors-Celtics pairing in the NBA Finals will shake out.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
